com.hci.geotagger.common
Class UserSession

java.lang.Object
  com.hci.geotagger.common.UserSession

public final class UserSession
extends Object

UserSession class keeps track of the current session. It knows if a user is logged in, and also caches the user account object of the logged in user. Chris Loeschorn Spring 2013

Constructor Summary

Method Summary
static void login(Context c, MyUserAccount account)
          Set LoggedIn flag to true, cache current user account object and set shared preferences so the login is saved even if the application is killed or crashes
static void logout(Context c)
          Logout method clears static fields, sets LoggedIn to false, and clears shared preferences
